name: Compound Bow
desc: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.
skill_desc: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2%/1.5%/1.8%/2.1%/2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
